Text: Update on Gabrielle Grace Cc Curie Grace Born pm Weight lbs oz Length inches As many of you already know Gabrielle was diagnosed with a congenital heart defect called hypoplastic left heart syndrome which means that the left side of her heart did not develop correctly Today she is undergoing the first of three surgeries designed to replumb the heart so that the right side does all the work This first step is a very dangerous and complicated procedure The second and third operations will take place at months and years of age Fortunately Texas Childrens Hospital has the best infant cardiac department in the country Gabrielle was taken into surgery at am and still has a few hours to go I last spoke to Jim around pm and he said that things were going well and that there have been no complications Jim and Michele wanted to express their gratitude for the outpouring of love and prayer Lets all keep praying and stay optimistic for the best possible outcome Thank you Dina K Snow Enron North America Corp Legal Dept EB

Update on Gabrielle Grace Cc NEWS Gabrielle was released from surgery today at pm All signs show that the surgery was a success but we will know more tomorrow Thanks for all of your thoughts and prayers

Update on Gabrielle Grace Cc been many inquiries about Gabrielle so I thought I would give everybody an update Unfortunately the prognosis is not good She has had many complications since the surgery chest fluid blood clots infections and fluctuating blood pressure due to high blood acidity For the past hours she has been relatively stable but no improvements She is still in ICU and it could still go either way When Jims year old son Connor visited Gabrielle on Monday he looked at Jim and said Gabrielle wants to go home Please keep her in your prayers Thank you Dina

International Cellular PhonePower Adaptersavailable for use within the ENA legal department International Cellular Phone may be used in over countries usage is charged at per minute there is no monthly charge for the phone which will be billed to the specific cost center of the user Power Adapters give you the capability to use your laptop computer from your hotel room office etc in numerous countries Both of these items will be kept at my desk and may be checked out on a firstcome firstserve basis Thank you Dina K Snow Enron North America Corp Legal Dept EB

Gabrielle Grace Cc with deep sadness that I pass on the following message from Jim My good friends Gabrielle Curie Grace peacefully passed away Saturday night at approximately pm Michele and I want to express out deepest gratitude for all of your thoughts prayers and words of encouragement We are having a small private grave site service on Tuesday at am We are asking that in lieu of sending flowers people make donations to the following Gabrielle Grace Memorial Fund Texas Childrens Hospital Congenital Heart Surgery Fannin MC Houston TX

Conflict ChecksYoung will be out of the office on Monday and Tuesday March and If you need conflicts checks done please contact one of the following people Ed Hearn Mary Heinitz Deb Korkmas Dina Snow Thank you

guys I had a great time last nighthopefully we can get together again sometime Its nice to get out of the house and away from my studying Im getting the pictures put on a CD tomorrow but will only be sending them out to a select few And of course only the ones I approve of I dont want them circulating around the office too muchI try to keep my outside life separate from work as much as possible ya know So keep an eye outyou may be getting an email over the weekend Dina

FW CLE International Swaps and Derivatives Productsyou are interested in attending this CLE course tomorrow please contact Melba Trevino at x as soon as possible Forwarded by Dina SnowCorpEnron on PM Melba nronXgate PM To Dina nron cc Subject FW CLE International Swaps and Derivatives Products It is at the Four Seasons Hotel here in Houston Registration starts at AM with a continental breakfast Let me know if one of your attorneys attend All that needs to be done is that the mention that they are taking Julia Chins place Original Message From Trevino Melba Sent Monday March PM To Mintz Jordan Bahlmann Gareth Ephross Joel Karathanos Gina Subject CLE International Swaps and Derivatives Products Tomorrow March at AM ISDA will be hosting a CLE Workshop at the Four Seasons Hotel in Houston I have already paid for Julia however she will be unable to attend Therefore if you are interested in attending please let me know ASAP Thanks Melba Trevino Fax EB a

REWere on the th floor of the new buildingit was fulltheres only about of us left Ive never been through anything like this so yesterday was very hard for both Paula shes still here too and myselfto watch alot of our group walking out the door Its pretty quiet here too Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday December PM To Snow Dina Subject RE Still here Pretty quiet on the floor though How hard did your area get hit Original Message From Snow Dina Sent Tuesday December AM To Nemec Gerald Subject I saw you in the parking garage this morning So you survived the first round too huh

REThought Id tell youPaula was let go this morning Somehow I survived the second round Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday December PM To Snow Dina Subject RE Still here Pretty quiet on the floor though How hard did your area get hit Original Message From Snow Dina Sent Tuesday December AM To Nemec Gerald Subject I saw you in the parking garage this morning So you survived the first round too huh
Good morning Geraldwant to go to lunch one day this week
